dialogues.text: Welcome to Reel Runners! Do you want a quick overview of how to play?
Our Reel Runner machine has just a few simple rules to get you started.
First, is the Reel itself, giving that a good click will set everything into motion.
Below that, are the control buttons.  These will allow the player to interact with the machine.
Clicking Info will bring out an info panel, showing your current combos (we'll get to those in a second).
Clicking Options will bring up the options menu, allowing the player to adjust some basic settings on the machine.
Clicking the circular arrow button, or SWAP button, will allow the player to choose a new payline, circling through the different heroes attacks.
Before we go any further, would you like to hear about building combos? Or would you like to pick a risk and get started?
To build a combo, the player will have to make use of the mechanics we talked about earlier.
Using the SWAP button, select a path you would like to follow, choosing carefully.  For example, 7,7,7.  This awards the SEVENS bonus.
At the top of the INFO panel, there is a GUIDE tab, clicking on this will display a list of known combos to seek out.
Next to the GUIDE tab is a CARDS tab that explains each of the different cards.  You can learn about the different EFFECT cards there
Now with that out of the way, let's talk about your loan...
How much risk are you willing to accept?
